author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Sauron's hatred of Númenor would bring about some of his greatest victories.  However, the great men who would rise from the ashes would ever gnaw at him, culminating in the rise of Aragorn in 3019 of the Third Age.  It is this hatred and fear that would lead to Sauron's undoing...

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!

title: Why Sauron Fears Aragorn | Tolkien Explained
